title: The Left's Abortion Meltdown | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Larry Elder | 9/3/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the backlash over Texas’ heartbeat abortion bill. A facility performed 67 abortions in 17 hours to beat the clock before Texas’ new abortion law kicked in. Lt. Col. Scott Mann joins to talk about the emotional turmoil veterans are facing in the wake of Afghanistan and the importance of storytelling. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including Afghanistan, President Biden’s falling approval, and Texas’ heartbeat bill. California gubernatorial candidate Larry Elder joins to talk about his campaign and the odds he’s facing as a conservative in California. Glenn previews his podcast with MMA fighter Tim Kennedy, who brings the fire on Afghanistan, his purpose in life, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
